name: Love Live! Sunshine!! - Suitei no Arisu (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
ship: You x Riko

Links

Author's Pixiv
Author's Twitter

name: Touhou ~ The Tiles That I Cannot Cut Are Next to None! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A mahjong craze has swept Gensokyo. Youmu, a total beginner at mahjong (with a completely useless ability at that), has no choice but to go against the top players of Gensokyo – for her mistress' honor and her own!

name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
nutshell:
A collection of oneshots.
1st Story: Mountain Love - A story of a girl, who is under stress to get into a medical school and one day, falls in love with her doctor.
2nd Story: A Mermaid is Singing - A story of a boy, who tries to commit suicide (because of certain medical reasons) and a girl who tries to stop him.
3rd Story: Autumn Night's Dream - A story of an architect and a girl who helps him to realise his real dream.
4th Story: ECHO - A story about a girl who knows the people who killed their class president but is unable to express her own thoughts.
5th Story: The Sleeping Time Paradox

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Aggressor
nutshell: Set during the Universal Century’s One Year War, this story followers exiled soldiers from Zeon join the Earth Federation Space Force (E.F.S.F.) and form a unit called "Aggressor."

name: Abe-kun ni Nerawaretemasu
nutshell: Akari couldn't think less of her school's karate champ, Abe-kun, despite him being the national champion. He's giant, uncouth, and couldn't be more different than her sweet angel and childhood friend, Takuto. But when Abe-kun injures his arm protecting her, she takes it upon herself to get him healed—after all, the school's pride is at stake—but finds the tables suddenly turned when he confesses to her! Now she's the goal he's aiming for, and she'll soon find out how driven a national champion can be!

name: Cosplay Yuri Ecchi Anthology
nutshell:
バニー、メイド、天使に悪魔…どんなわたしも、ぜんぶ見て♥
コスプレ百合えっちを詰め込んだアンソロジーが登場！
シスターや猫耳、ミニスカサンタ、チアガール&学ランに着ぐるみまで、いつもと違う彼女の魅力をオール描き下ろしでお届けします★

name: Tales of Destiny
nutshell:
Stahn Aileron was just a simple country-boy who left in search of adventure. While a stowaway on a transport that got taken down by monsters, he found the sentient sword Dymlos, a relic of an ancient war. Now he's stuck with Rutee, a brazen bounty-hunter, Mary, a kind-hearted warrior, Philia, a naive priestess, and the stuck-up Leon as they pursue enemies who have stolen an object with the power to destroy the world!
Based on the role-playing game of the same name by Namco Tales Studio.

name: PPPPPP
nutshell: Gakuon Otogami was a genius pianist whose name is among the greatest in the annals of the music world. He had seven children who also all became genius pianists. All seven except for the one named Lucky that is. This is the miraculous story of a regular kid taking on godly talent!

name: Replicant - Hitsuji no Dolly wo Aisuru to Iu Koto -
nutshell: I want to be with you. Even if it's a fake (replica) — a world that has succeeded in replicating a perfect human. Chris, who works at the Clone Institute, had a special feeling towards his colleague Seth. But he has a clean and beautiful fiance. The more he feels he wants, the more he suffers. As Seth's engagement approaches, he comes up with a plan.

name: On the Emperor's Lap
nutshell:
A heartbreaking, fantasy romance of the two wounded souls finding their way back to each other again.
"He abandoned me as a child, and I lost my voice. When I was reunited with him I was already broken."
Little Bella, a war orphan who once trusted for survival; grows up carrying an abandonment wound. It’s a life without purpose, she’s the unseen, unheard, and a war slave.
Kiris embraces Bella, a girl he once abandoned, now has been forgotten. Maybe it is too late when he’d found her again.
Will she get over past hurts and believe in love again, when there is too much damage done?
(Source: NetComics)
Official English 2
Official English 3
Based on the Original Webnovel by USOI

name: Mowang Yu Yongzhe Yu Sheng Jian Shendian
nutshell:
[From OSTNT]
The continent of RAIEO was once ravaged by the Demon Lord and the Demon Race, in the darkest of times a Brave Knight carrying with him a Sacred Sword, saved the continent. After 300 years of peace, with the Sacred Sword now gone and the Sacred Sword Temple being occupied by the Demon Race, the continent of RAIEO is once again at a threat of war. Thus, our protagonist together with his donkey and a mysterious girl embark on a journey to stop the Demon Lord and the Demon Race.

name: Kick of the Oni
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Tadashi Sawamura (1943 – 2021) is the oriental middleweight kickboxing champion. This work depicts the life of a man who is legendary as an outstanding martial artist. His sincere way of life, in which he devotes himself to one thing and one thing only, is heartwarming.
You can learn a lot from him not only as a martial artist but also as a man and a human being!

name: Picnic
nutshell:
Relationships are tough, but relationships between friends can be even tougher. That's what Koreeda discovers when Noda – one of his college buddies – offers to become "friends with benefits." Until recently, Koreeda has had a serious girlfriend. But now he's on the rebound and looking for something different… something real.
Stories 3-5: feature Hashimoto and Oikawa from Boku ni Datte Iibun ga Aru.

name: Boukyaku no Shirushi to Hime
nutshell: After 3662 blind dates, the 160-years-old Headless King that everyone fears of, is finally getting married! But when he faces the cute and gentle Princess, the King keeps hiding from her instead!? How will the Headless King and the Princess get to know each other?

name: Metalica Metaluca
nutshell: In a world where rare metals drive the economy, "Minea", the people who seek out these metals at the risk of their own life, are highly respected. A strange boy called Ruka has wandered destructively into the failing town of Elza, declaring that his goal is to be a Minea! He ends up under the surveillance of a village girl, Shella, whose little brother is sick from a poison gas accident in the town's now-closed mine. But there may be more to this situation than meets the eye! Will Ruka be able to help his new friends, and maybe one day become a legendary Minea?

name: Yuurei Ryokou Dairiten - Soul Mate Tourist
nutshell: At her grandmothers funeral 5 years ago Touno Mariko saw her grandmothers ghost. Ever since then she has been able to see ghosts. One day when visiting her grandmother she accidentally angers an old spirit and is saved by Takenaka Masato. Masato works for a spirit travel agency, which is exactly what it sounds like. As fate would have it Mariko now has to work for this agency to pay off her debt to the angered spirit.

name: Takane no Hana wa Midasaretai
nutshell: "Hana & Renjaku thought they'd spend happy days together as pairs, but..."

name: Soaring Heavenly Dragon
nutshell: After the loss of their family, the Ling Family’s descendants flee for shelter. Unexpectedly, they come across a young man while escaping. From then on, they commence the path of the unknown.

name: Hana and Kiss in the 2DK
nutshell: Hana, who works in a design office, moves into the same apartment as her older colleague, whom she admires... Hana hopes that her relationship with this older colleague will get better, but when she wakes up in her new room on her first day, she finds a strange man sleeping in her bed... He seems to be the master of the room... A love story that begins with a kiss, in an apartment where dreams blossom.

name: Ki no Uta
nutshell: A long, long time ago, far away from the city life, Martin, a gardener lives together with his wife a retired life within a forest. One night, Martin takes in a visitor who seemed to be a traveller.

name: Kare wa Hitsuji wo Kabutta Ookami
.hack//XXXX
nutshell: When he first logs-on, he sees his friend fall into a coma before his very eyes. Now Kite is searching for the answers as to why, and how to save him, inside 'The World'. Based on the original PS2 .hack series, Infection Expansion (Vol.1), Malignant Mutation (Vol.2), Erosion Pollution (Vol.3), and Absolute Encirclement (Vol.4).

name: Dorobou to Keiji
nutshell: Hugo is a detective chasing after a mysterious thief! Dr. Martin, the phantom thief, strikes to steal anything he encounters, but he seems to be after something more!

name: Star Stealing Girl
nutshell: IT’s a journey filled with love and dream. When your everyday next door sweetheart September turns into the notorious thief, a series of mysterious events that surrounded the ancient Silan Kingdom started happening. Love and friendship, justice and evil, power and forgiveness. How should our heroine choose her journey?

name: Omae, Tanuki ni Naranee ka?
nutshell:
"Tired of life? Be a tanuki!"
A story of being scouted by a raccoon dog when trying to die.

name: Icing
nutshell:
"Hyeok-su’s never given that much thought into this own future. He never concentrates in class, he’s been kicked out of the basketball team, his father’s always thinking up a wild investment plan—he knows he won’t amount to much, so why bother? After he finds out that participating in viral brawls is a better investment than studying, he dedicates his entire attention to that “sport.”
However, one day he discovers another sport that’ll benefit him in the long run. Ice hockey.
How difficult could it be? It’s just swinging some sticks around on ice, isn’t it?"


Original Webtoon <Naver>

name: Outlast: The Murkoff Account
nutshell: La corporación Murkoff esconde secretos que tienen que ser protegidos, para ello los aseguradores de la empresa Paul Marion y Pauline Glick tomarán la responsabilidad de mitigar sea como sea a cualquier amenaza que haga caer las grandes murallas que Murkoff ha construido en la capacidad intelectual de sus v� ctimas.

name: Puppeteer
nutshell: Garo oneshot from 1982-07.
